title: Profi
text: Client portal Health journey Messaging Forms & journaling Scheduling Telehealth Client engagement Progress tracking AI agents Care orchestration Workflow automation Programs & Content Billing Reporting Health analytics EHR Coming soon Average provider hourly rate Average number of providers on a team Hours/day wasted by providers on non-client work report Working days Total Avoid these hidden costs. Cover your Profi investment with just one client session/provider and start growing revenue. Providers get their own calendar, scheduling links, templates, and an easy way to work with clients. Each client gets a secure on-brand portal where they can schedule and join sessions, engage with you and your content, pay, and more. View session attendance and revenue reports, track provider capacity and client progress. No more wasting days on gathering this data from multiple sources. See how other health & wellness, career, life, leadership, executive coaching organizations are using and growing with Profi. How Lotus unlocked a new revenue stream through scalable care programs.
